body: At 15th level, a street performer's disappearing act enables affected creatures to move through crowd squares and enemy-occupied squares without impediment. Affected creatures are treated as if having greater invisibility, but enemies gain a new saving throw to notice them each time they are attacked. This performance replaces inspire heroics.
name: Slip through the Crowd
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Bard/Bard Archetypes/Street Performer/Bardic Performance/Slip through the Crowd
